Store Utils¶

apps.store.utils.decrement_product_quantity(order)¶

Decrements the product’s quantity Params:

-order: [Object] The specific order that have been triggered

apps.store.utils.get_owned_stores(request)¶

Gets the user’s owned stores Return:

-owned_store: [List] A list containing the user’s stores

apps.store.utils.send_order_confirmation(order)¶

Send the order’s confirmation to the customer Parameters:

-order: [Dictionary] Order’s information
